authentication.phoneNumberInUse: Phone number is already in use
authentication.doNotHaveAccountYet: You don't have an account yet?
authentication.distribution: Receive unique offers and participate in promotions from club partners
authentication.stewardInfo: This will help you in steward registration process. After signing up you'll have to confirm your becoming steward request by saving credentials in your profile.

registrationTypeSelect.header: Do you already have a season ticket or a fan card?
registrationTypeSelect.section1text: Includes the right to visit all home matches of the club in the championship and the Russian Cup (up to the 1/2 finals inclusive), as well as the right to purchase tickets from the 1st stage of sales for the matches of all tournaments of the season.
registrationTypeSelect.section2text: Issued free of charge and allows you to purchase tickets for the club's home matches. Includes priority purchase of tickets for the home matches of all tournaments (from the 2nd stage of sales).
registrationTypeSelect.warningText: Attention, buying tickets through the mobile app is only possible with a season ticket or a fan card.

authentication.phoneHint: Enter the phone numbers associated with the subscription or fan card.
authentication.resetPasswordTitle: a new password will be sent to the specified number
authentication.resetPasswordHint: If you already have a season ticket or a fan card, please indicate the linked phone number.
authentication.resendCodePossibility: Signing up will be available in {{interval}}
authentication.passwordHint: The password can be changed in the profile
authentication.sureCancelRecovering: Do you really want to cancel password recovering process?

validation.passwordFormat: Password must be at least 8 characters long, consist of Latin characters, contain lowercase and uppercase letters and numbers
validation.nameFormat: Must be between 1 and 50 characters long
validation.emailFormat: The entered value should match a@a.aa format

editProfile.logoutDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to logout?

about.firstBody: - your universal assistant in the world of classified ads! Our app provides a convenient and secure way to buy or sell almost anything, from household appliances to real estate and cars.
about.secondBody: Here you will find a wide selection of goods and services offered by both individuals and companies. Whether it’s searching for an apartment, buying a car, or choosing a contractor for housework - all this is available in a few clicks.
about.categoriesBody: From real estate and cars to household appliances and clothing.
about.searchBody: Set up search filters to quickly find what you need.
about.securityBody: We make every effort to make transactions safe and transparent.
about.easyPublishBody: Sell your products by posting ads quickly and easily.
about.personalAreaBody: Manage your ads and settings through your personal account.
about.thirdBody: we are committed to providing you with the best shopping and selling experience. Constant updates and improvements make our application even more convenient and functional.
about.thanksBody: We are happy to help you make successful transactions.

favorite.title: Add ads to favorites
favorite.text: You can come back to them later

myAdvertises.text:

Create and publish your ad right now to offer products or services to a wide audience.
